ThingDef.label: pipe tobacco
ThingDef.description:
A blend of carefully cured and fermented tobacco leaves crafted specifically for smooth pipe smoking. This mix enhances aroma and flavor, delivering a rich, lasting experience for those who appreciate classic, artisanal blends.

<color=#E5E54C>Trade considerations:</color>

<color=#E5E54C>Ingredients:</color> Making 20 pipe tobacco requires 50 tobacco leaves for a total value of 55, and sells for 5, giving a <color=#33CC33>45%</color> profit per unit.

<color=#E5E54C>Value per work:</color> Recipe requires 400 work, which results on a value per work of <color=#33CC33>0.25</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Caravan trading:</color> Its weight is 0.01 Kg, for a value per Kg of <color=#33CC33>500</color>.

<color=#E5E54C>Profit per day:</color> On average, profit per day is <color=#33CC33>0.14</color> (for reference Yayo is 0.35).
